ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bind Poll
ygData.msgSnippet: To me some of these spots are useless... More usefull ones would be in Kunark where you have run for half an hour and zone 10 times to get to anywhere (other
ygData.messageBody:
To me "some" of these spots are useless... More usefull ones would be in
Kunark where you have run for half an hour and zone 10 times to get to
anywhere (other then karnors). SoV is pretty big too in that way. If you
screw your giant faction, then that means you have to bind in dwarf town or
skyshrine(am i right?) To my knowledge there arent any other spots on that
continent, but i might be wrong, i hope there are more...


Here's my thoughts on your thoughts 8)

Very likely:
Lavastorm (outside Solusek & Najena) <-- useless, Freeport and Neriak are
not far (and i think you can bind in temple of sol ro across the lava lake)
South Karana (outside Paw) <-- this could be handy, but arena is not far
Dagnor's Cauldron (perhaps anywhere) <--- this could be nice...
Ocean of Tears (perhaps anywhere) <--- /agree 100% taking a boat is a
pain in the butt when you're racing with a timer for a rez
Lesser Faydark (outside Mistmoore) <-- useless, just bind at entrance of
faymart
Feerott (outside Cazic Thule) <-- only handy for good races
Innothule Swamp (outside Guk) <-- same as feerott imo

Not so likely:
Toxxulia (outside Paineel) <-- maybe
Erud's Crossing (at docks) <-- doubt it, its a ghost zone, meaning people
were once there, but they're gone now
West Commons (outside Belfallen) <-- freeport isnt that far away
Everfrost (outside Permafrost) <-- this would revive everfrost maybe, what
they really need is a gate in everfrost, right now the only way to gate to
everfrost is shaman gate potions.


Minkin

From: JESSICA_WEBBER@... [mailto:JESSICA_WEBBER@...]

Subject: [eqbards] Bind Poll

Peace
Evulia of Tunare
